findings.title: Missing check on the total weight of all the staking pools
findings.description: The total `weight_basis_points` of staking pools may exceed 100% and starvation may occur in the lightweight staking pool when we operating on the distribute_staking.

findings.title: Conflicts between account roles are not fully considered
findings.description: No check on whether the new operator_account_id equals the other IDs (e.g., DEVELOPER_ACCOUNT_ID), resulting in repeated account IDs.

findings.title: Missing check on the conflicts while setting account roles
findings.description: The owner can change the `operator_account_id` and `owner_id` by invoking certain functions without checking whether the new `operator_account_id` equals other IDs (e.g., `DEVELOPER_ACCOUNT_ID`), resulting in repeated account IDs.

findings.title: Account treasury_account cannot be read or modified
findings.description: The treasury_account_id can not be changed after the contract is deployed and initialized.

findings.title: Function assert_callback_calling can be replaced by #[private]
findings.description: The function `assert_callback_calling` can be replaced with the `#[private]` macro provided by near-sdk-rs.

findings.title: Unused macro is found
findings.description: The `#[payable]` macro is not required in function `set_reward_fee` because it does not require additional attached deposits.

findings.title: Inconsistent implementation between function realize_meta_massive and realize_meta
findings.description: Function realize_meta_massive adds an additional check on updating the account compared to function realize_meta.

findings.title: Function get_staking_pool_list may not work
findings.description: The gas may not be enough for a transaction invoking function get_staking_pool_list due to huge number of stacking pools.
